body:
Thanks for feedback @claynerobison and @nhasabni.
Adding `-fopenmp` under double condition of if_mkl and if_linux appears to be tricky as bazel doesn't support nested select https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/1623
The only working solution I have found so far is to update `set_cc_opt_flags` in `configure.py` with these lines
```
  if is_linux():
    write_to_bazelrc("build:mkl --copt=-fopenmp")
    write_to_bazelrc("build:mkl --host_copt=-fopenmp")
```
Please let me know if this is acceptable solution or suggest any other options.

P.S.
I have never used/modified bazel before, so suggestions are very welcome.
